website_summaries.verdict: Once they're broken in, buyers love these boots for their comfort, look, and durability.
pros: Full-grain, Sienna Cache leather with rubber sole
cons: These are a little stiff at first and take a bit to break in
This boot tends to run a half-size large

customer_reviews.title: Blisters from hell.. Break-in with great care... RMNP proof.
customer_reviews.text: After a week of mountaineering in RMNP, I pretty much ripped the skin off my heels and Achilles' tendons. HOWEVER, these boots have great traction, helped me hike up waterfalls and the side of a mountain. They are close to bulletproof. Advice: take some time to truly break-in, wear 2 pair of wool socks (saved me from additional damage), lace for comfort (I'm still learning this), and get blister shields!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaLS

customer_reviews.title: Too big but...impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Truly impressed with this purchase. Okay... the boots were way too big. I used the review and charts. I believe I was off a full size. However, I ordered a size smaller and just shipped back the other ones. I was already refunded .New ones coming tonight. I'll update on the next pair. The chart and reviews stating women's sizing was difficult here.I wear a EU 40 or about a 9.5. not in these and my foot is on the wide side. Reordered an 8.5M hope they work! The 8.5 fit well. Odd sizing, great boot!
customer_reviews.author: Dlr

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of buying new hiking shoes every year, so after reading reviewes, I purchased these. They have a great stiff sole for walking over uneven ground and rocks. They are also waterproof and look great. I spent some time breaking these in before hiking and I got blisters in the process (happens easily for me) but now they are wonderful. The sole doesn't make for good pavement walking, so I always plan on having a different shoe if I have to do that on the same trip. Looking forward to many more adventures in these.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: ... Danner site and previous reviewers) but I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing and I was hesitant to order a half size down (as suggested on the Danner site and previous reviewers) but I am so glad I did! They fit like a charm. These boots are so expensive I did not know if I would keep them, but once I saw them in person I absolutely could never return them. They are so beautifully crafted and comfortable. I think they will last a lifetime and get better with age. They are my favorite boots!!!
customer_reviews.author: yellowredhead

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous and high quality boot that will get better with age and last
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, gorgeous and high quality boot that will get better with age and last! I wear a 7 normally and a 7 fit perfect. Purchased regular thickness smartwool hiking socks to wear with these. Make sure to break them in before any strenuous activity. I also reccomend using a leather waterproof spray on them to ensure longevity. I love Kiwi heavy duty waterproof spray amd use Kiwi product on all my leather and suede shoes (they make one specifically for suede) its cheap and does the job! I researched these for weeks and waited 2 years before pulling the trigger on these and so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: lauren b

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are perfection! I love them and I've been wearing them with everything. The quality is outstanding and they are beautiful! I wear a solid 6.5 most of the time and even a size 7 in sandals. I went with the Danner website recommendation and sized down. I ordered a size 6 and they fit perfect. I've been wearing the llbean rag camp sock, medium/heavy and could even put a different insole in them and wear a lighter sock I think. I don't think they feel narrow at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: These boots are a dream.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were everything I was hoping for, and I had very high expectations. They fit to size, are comfortable from the moment I put them on and they look great! Of course they look great! Based on the construction and quality, I'm sure they will last me until I die. Best part - American made in Portland, Oregon!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Naillon

customer_reviews.title: These are beautifully constructed, attractive hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: These are beautifully constructed, attractive hiking boots. My only complaint is that they rub on my achilles. I am hoping that they will break in, as I definitely would not be able to wear them on an all day hike unless they do. They are also fairly heavy - I will likely wear them only as snow boots or on short outdoor activities and will find another pair for actual hiking. They are so beautifully made I am keeping them even if they won't work for what I got them for.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functionable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. They are so cute and a super durable. I hiked in both Grand Tetons and Yellowstone with these. They do take awhile to break in so give yourself time to do it before you're trip. I used mink oil on mine and it did darken the color but they were still beautiful. I debated about ordering a size down or staying to my true size so I stayed with my true size. I had plenty of toe room and after some insoles and boot tying tutorials, I was ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: XpaigeXmarieX

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE These! I did order a 1/2 size smaller like recommended by the company and they fit perfectly! They are really comfortable and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyInWonderland

customer_reviews.title: Size down .5 size
customer_reviews.text: Usually 8.5M US- sized down to 8 & fit is perfect (average feet on wider side). Break in period was torturous- took about 3 - 4 miles before I didn't get any blisters but OMG most comfortable shoes I have now. Got me through my trip in Iceland in all types of conditions no problem & am now hiking in these all over national parks! I'm buying another pair of Danners! I wish I could wear these to work...
customer_reviews.author: Anoneemousse

customer_reviews.title: Love my Danner boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Danner boots! I purchased these boots for our trip to the Grand Canyon and I'm so glad that I did. I wore them for a few days before the trip to break them in and I didn't have any trouble with blisters or any kind of pain. After reading some of the reviews, I ordered the size that I normally wear in shoes and they fit perfectly for me. They are comfortable and very stylish. I got so many compliments on them, especially from people who watched the movie "Wild". I would highly reccomend these boots and I think they were worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanieb78

customer_reviews.title: The boots are beautiful. My pair came without the insoles
customer_reviews.text: The boots are beautiful. My pair came without the insoles. Maybe that is how it is supposed to be on Amazon, but it is not the case when buying them from Danner directly. The leather has marks on it, and this was disappointing. I sent them back, and I received another pair with the same issue, but much worse. I expected a better quality boot for the price. I still have not worn them because of it. I want to treat the leather first before it gets worse.
customer_reviews.author: Marcyr

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issues
customer_reviews.text: Just a note on sizing. I wear women's 9us in Brooks adrenaline and Asics gel Kayano, the odd dress shoe is sized smaller but in these boots I fit a 7.5. After reading reviews I went half a size down to 8.5 but that is still 1 size too big. They are a long, fairly narrow boot, beautifully crafted and comfortable once u get the sizing right. Use the European sizing as a more accurate guide to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anne_Blue_Mountains

customer_reviews.title: High quality, superb workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Really fine workmanship. Very high quality materials and construction. Unfortunately, due to anatomical features of wearer's ankle, the boot caused uncomfortable sensation in heel and Achilles area. Boots returned without prejudice, as many other boots affect wearer in a similar way because of unique anatomy. Otherwise, amazing boots.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots... that run huge.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the quality. Unfortunately, I had to return due to size. Bought these for my wife, we read the reviews and saw some people mention they ran big, others said they were fine so (considering she's a solid 8.5) we stayed with the 8.5. They were huge. Tried them with thicker socks but it didn't matter. These are exceptionally well made hiking boots and made in the USA (which I love) but we'll have to try again with an 8... or maybe even 7.5?! Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Guy

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet Here
customer_reviews.text: Literally just opened the box and put them on and have been walking around the house in them for about 15 minutes. I wanted these last year and couldn't get myself to spend the $$. I thought I would just try them on and if it wasn't an instant love affair I would send them back. I'm in love. I ordered a pair of Timberlands too...no comparison!!! I ordered my actual size and they feel great. If I have any problems or complaints about my boots in the future I will update this review.....if no update is found assume I'm someplace walking around happy in my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Deb just Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! - need a little time to break in, but are great once you do!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for a cross country trip last summer. We hiked between 10 - 18 miles a day for 17 days straight and they did not disappoint. I wish I had broken them in a bit more before we left, but they were good nonetheless. They were sturdy and tough on some really varied terrain. I also wish I had treated them with a leather oil, but they remained in great condition even after hitting water, rocks and sand! A great looking boot that can live up to the job too!
customer_reviews.author: jill c.

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Wowser. I'm glad I spent the extra money to purchase these boots. Not only are they beautiful, they are extremely comfortable when out exploring the outdoors. Great traction, even in the mud. Puddles, not to worry, your feet will stay dry. Not heavy on the foot, atleast I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these boots, but after wearing them around the house I knew they wouldnt work for hiking. They are very heavy and feel clumsy. They also are narrow in the toe box yet slip in the heel area. They also seem more like a fashion boot vs a true hiker.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Liesenfelder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, I wore them around my house a couple days and they easily broke in. Wore them on my trip to Colorado and they were perfect for hiking. Wore them in Jackson Hole for skiing and loved them.
customer_reviews.author: tt

customer_reviews.title: Real hiker right here for sure!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a real hiking boot, this is it. They are very stiff when new so do not be surprised at that. They do run a little large so get a 1/2 size down from your norm. I always wear a 6.5 boot in Danner sizing and with these boots, I wear a 6. The styling and quality is top shelf for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy shoes and are very cute. But to me they lack the comfort I am looking for. They are heavy and have caused my feet some serious pain. Personally, I wouldn't buy them again. They don't allow for much movement which is important when hiking over boulders in the Adirondacks. I wish I spent the money on a more flexible and comfortable boot.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Love Danner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Danner boots. Not only is the boot as great as expected, but Danner customer service is fabulous. They were happy to help me via email. Also very efficient. I've been loving breaking in my new boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rocky Mountains and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Can’t wait to take these hiking in the Tetons. I can confirm they are true to size, but if you are in between sizes and fluctuate, pick the larger size. I’m an 8 1/2 for flats, but size USA 9 for activewear shoes and a size 9 fit phenomenally with ample rooms. These also break in super well as long as you wear them around the house or short walks a bit a few days before any longer hike as with any hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey korthoff

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nothing less than amazing in true Danner fashion. They are not only beautiful down to the packaging but the quality and craftsmanship is undeniable. They were comfortable right out of the box and will only get better in time. As other reviewers stated they run a little big so I ordered a half size down and they fit perfectly! I like the airthotics that come with Danners which are pretty sleek and don't make a big difference in the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: and pretty much everything else
customer_reviews.text: A quality American made product. Came fresh in the box and have been my go to boot for hiking, snow, and pretty much everything else. I also got the leather conditioner they recommend and my boots still look great after hiking in Rocky Mountain park for a week. And they're cute! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful boots but they were way too narrow for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boots but they were way too narrow for my feet. I was super bummed because they are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: LMF

customer_reviews.title: Not that Comfty
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but for the price paid, I was expecting a much more comfortable boot. I wear hiking boots every day and I wont wear this on a regular basis. The leather is too stiff and the boot is too heavy. Good ankle support. Keen, Timberland, Columbia or Merill are way more comfortable. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina O.

customer_reviews.title: The soles are pretty big and chunky
customer_reviews.text: The soles are pretty big and chunky...so if your feet are large like mine, it can make them look even larger. That part is disappointing, but they're Danners, and that makes them pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: from the hills

customer_reviews.title: They are SUPER CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these boots. They are SUPER CUTE!!! They fit as expected. I wear a standard 10, and I am happy with how they fit. I have only worn them once for a short walk around the block. I've heard you have to break them in. I wore them with some thick hiking socks and they felt comfortable. I am a little concerned with the weight of the shoes, so we'll see how that goes on longer walks and actual hikes. I look forward to wearing them on hikes and wearing around the city in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: jolene garcia

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: What gorgeous boots! I always wear a size 8, but I returned the first pair for an 8 1/2 because my toes felt cramped with only thin socks. The right achilles heel blistered immediately within minutes. I didn't give up and bought mole skin and doubled up on socks to break them in. The leather conditioner by danner is a must. It darkened them beautifully and softned them. After 2 weeks of breaking them in they are keepers!
customer_reviews.author: judita

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe...but very price
customer_reviews.text: Very pricey, but overall good durable shoe. It's true to fit.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Girl

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely amazing. Totally recommend keeps your feet protected dry and safe
customer_reviews.author: Ada Chinen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeee! Is totally an understatement. Well crafted leather boots that are perfect for all conditions. A boot that finally keeps my feet warm. Can be worn with heavy socks no problem. It was a perfect fit from the moment I put my foot in. I used the danner website to approximate the size I would need and it is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I am breaking them in right now probably wearing them a little over an hour a day. I plan on many years of hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Azalee M. Scofield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots. I have found Danner boots to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. I have found Danner boots to be a bit narrow, so I order a wide, but they last and last and last. Comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: tjack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, but need to by at least 1/2 size smaller if not a whole size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Super fashionable and durable
customer_reviews.text: After months of trying to decide what size I should buy, I finally purchased my regular size which is 8.5. They fit perfectly! And my chunky socks are able to be worn with them! Super fashionable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots
customer_reviews.text: Love my boots! Have got a ton of compliments on them! They are light and comfortable except for they kinda hurt the back of my legs where the tops of the boots sit bc they are so stiff , but I'm hoping that goes away once I break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like theres nothing that needs to be said about these ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like theres nothing that needs to be said about these sexy, sturdy, badass boots. Like whoa. They are everything.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sueper

customer_reviews.title: Buy what a pro would and still look stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Extremely durable. Warm and cool. Stylish. Excellent arch support (and I have extreme arches). Warranty. Cons: takes a bit to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Jonseys

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta pay to get the best and these are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Caffey

customer_reviews.title: I sized a half size down. Slightly snug on ...
customer_reviews.text: I sized a half size down. Slightly snug on width of toes, but stretched out after 1 day of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl M.

customer_reviews.title: So far love love love
customer_reviews.text: So far love love love. I usually wear a size 7 1/2 with wider feet. They suggested a size 8. Fits great. Need to break in more!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Best all round outdoor shoe
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit great! I have been looking for a new boot to replace my old Columbia boots and had a hard time finding something that was comfortable, waterproof, durable, and most importantly fashionable. This hit all the marks. I am usually a size 8.5 but ordered the 9, and the boot fits great when wearing thick wool socks. These boots provide great reaction and have good foot and ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a solid size 9.I ordered a 8.5. The boots fit great with thick socks I still have plenty wiggle room for my toes.
customer_reviews.author: SeZZYcOoL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Cute and Warm
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so nice! Extremely light and cute enough to wear hiking then out to a casual dinner. I've received many compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: They REALLY do run big!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've thought about ordering these boots for years now. I can tell you that I read every single review. Many reviewers were saying these boots ran big while many others said to order your regular size. I decided to order my regular size 8 and they were HUGE!!! The boots are beautiful so I am sending them back for half a size smaller. I'll update my review once I get the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Obviously gorgeous - just seems like it is going to take too long to break ...
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe pressed on my Achilles. Obviously gorgeous - just seems like it is going to take too long to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Comfort on 1st wear!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. A small amount of break in required around top ankle portion of boot. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and I got a great price these! They are still $400 at REI so I'm really happy
customer_reviews.author: V.W.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Runs large! I was nervous about ordering a size 8 (I’m usually between an 8.5 and 9) but decided to follow everyone’s advice and they’re perfect! Went on a 5mile moderately difficult hike without breaking them in and they were absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: They smell absolutely wonderful and I can’t wait to wear them more
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these...especially at the sale price. They smell absolutely wonderful and I can’t wait to wear them more. They aren’t too heavy which is what I was worried about. They definitely will need to be broken in before longer wear, but they seem to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: 5 and thought about downsizing half a size but glad I did not
customer_reviews.text: i just received the boots today and they fit perfectly. I wear a size 6.5 and thought about downsizing half a size but glad I did not. I can tell the boots are going to be wonderful. I have been wearing them around the house all afternoon and of course they are a little stiff but I can tell they will break in easily.They are not heavy feeling because I am about the size of Reese Witherspoon and they feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife in her size after reading mixed reviews on sizing. They were much too big and we had to size down a half size. Great boots otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: John Z. Olha

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely perfect!!! I ordered 1/2 smaller than usual per the suggestion from the website and I couldn't be more happy!! They come with a removable long lasting arch support and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: elyse

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Look
customer_reviews.text: They are made really well and I love the look of them. They are definitely a big shoe (had to go down a 1/2 size), even when I found my size the shoe itself still seems big but I still like them. They’re rugged and unique and I get a lot of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they're great! I can't wait to break them in
customer_reviews.text: Erhmahgerd, they're great! I can't wait to break them in. Order half a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Make
customer_reviews.text: These boots are lovely, however, the right one bites into the top of my toes. I love the fact that they are made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Davis

customer_reviews.title: Long term investment
customer_reviews.text: Feels like the long term investment I’ll have for a life time. Sturdy and great to wear whenever
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit. Obviously well made. Easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Pam A. Gorecki

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots!!! I went down a half size like some of the other reviews said and it worked out great for me. They are very stiff around the ankle but I'm hoping they soften with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Barton

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I did get a few blisters which is to be expected with heavy duty hiking boots. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look but I needed a more flexible sole for my hiking.
customer_reviews.author: P Fit

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were super cute but really painful at the top back heel
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were super cute but really painful at the top back heel. It rubbed them raw and I only could wear them once.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Tuley

customer_reviews.title: The boots fit great, they are comfortable to work in
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit great, they are comfortable to work in. Worst thing is they are very stiff and breaking them was a little painful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bomia

customer_reviews.title: This is a great boot. Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boot. Comfortable right out of the box. Runs narrow, which is what I needed. Great support. I look forward to many years of service before the first re-sole is required. Great quality but you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but these boots are amazing! Comfortable, stylish and an amazing fit all around. I have a narrow foot with long toes, and I usually wear a EUR 39 / 8.5 US. I took Danner's advice and ordered an 8 US. They fit like a glove. Took a day to break them in, since they rubbed my heel a bit, but now are a dream. Got them to go hiking in Isle of Skye in Scotland and they kept my feet comfy and dry even after 5+ hours of hiking in boggy circumstances. I would 100% recommend!! So happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so well made. Very pleased with quality and style. They already size you up a bit for big socks so don't order up if you are actually using them for tracking vs looking cute... They achieve both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are breaking in very nicely. They don't seem to be bothering my feet with stiffness at all. They keep my feet very warm in the freezing temperatures! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: 5 is perfect. Love the color of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My regular shoe size is 9.5! On some shoes I need a 10 (Asics running shoes), but 9 just NEVER fits me. Neverthelss since so many people commented that those shoes would run big, I first ordered a size 9. Also , my husband bought a pair of Denners and needed to go 2 sizes down. However the 9 was way too small. the 9.5 is perfect. Love the color of these shoes, the style...they are awesome. Can't wait to take them for a long walk now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer X

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have s narrow foot and s true size 7. Fit perfectly. A little stiff but that is typical. Love love love!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie A.

customer_reviews.title: Danner Nailed It
customer_reviews.text: Broke in very easily and are now my favorite pair of shoes whether I'm backpacking or going to the grocery store. Thanks for making an awesome product Danner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wild
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is breaking them in but she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Grandma J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received the boots on time and I love them! They also fit as expected which was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Anyssa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: To be determined...
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy boot and wish I had listened to reviewers suggesting ordering 1/2 size smaller. Waiting for size smaller to compare and will decide if I want to keep. Heel and toe seem very stiff, hoping they break in before trip to New Zealand. Very cute so hoping they work out. Strange tongue piece where they lace up as well. Love that they are made in USA, will do my best to keep! later w review.
customer_reviews.author: Nhuttonrn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boots but fit was a bit larger than most shoes of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gee

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful. . I went a half size smaller and they fit perfect. . I love love love them..
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Just takes a long time to break in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well crafted, and made in the USA. Love them
customer_reviews.author: S. Aulman

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: They are every bit as beautiful, glorious, durable and well-constructed as other reviews have mentioned. They're certainly expensive, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly, but very very narrow. I take a size 8, and way too narrow for me. Sad, because this is a beautiful & well made boot. Wish they came in wide widths
customer_reviews.author: donna ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hiking boot!
customer_reviews.text: It took me almost a year to purshase. Because of the higher price, I could always find a better deal. What a waste of time. I could have saved more had I just bought these first! I love them. Glad I read reviews, and bought my actual shoe size. The size is perfect. I wear a 9.5 traditionally and bought a 9.5 yes perfect, with room for thick to moderate hiking socks. The leather is better than expected very soft to the touch. The shoe look are also better than expected. STRIKING!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: She says that they are realy comfortable. I ordered a half size larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered for a friend as a gift. She says that they are realy comfortable. I ordered a half size larger than normal. Good thing because the are a little narrower than most Danner boots and she wears Danners often.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but the size label on the box and shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, comfortable but the size label on the box and shoes shows a wrong european size, for example 7,5 US size is 38 EUR not 39,5. The Danner website shows right sizes.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots. Wonderful grip, became extensions of my feet as I walked through everything from the mojave to the Grand Canyon. Slot canyons and everything in between. I love the weight of them and how much support they have.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa R.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Get some boot dressing with that to help you break them in, but they look and feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: evelina

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Retro and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Retro and comfy...The fit is good not sure yet how they will wear in but they are a perfect snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: marie callaham

customer_reviews.title: comfortable.. a little stiff gonna take a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Warm..supportive. .comfortable. .a little stiff gonna take a lot to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was trying a med width, however did not ...
customer_reviews.text: I was trying a med width, however did not work for me, the quality of the boot met and exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Howe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are definitely worth the price. Good traction. Once you break them in they conform nicely to your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable hiking footwear I've owned
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable hiking footwear I've owned. Incredible service and beautiful packaging! I can tell these boots will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rachel Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my new Danner boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my new Danner boots! I ordered my normal size and they are a perfect fit. Love everything about them!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Fuldner

customer_reviews.title: At first I was disappointed because they felt very flat and hard like Doc ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was disappointed because they felt very flat and hard like Doc Martins, but then when I was taking the box to the recycle bin another box fell out. Inside this box were the orthotic inserts. I put those in, and inserted some Dr. Scholl's active (took out of my tennis shoes) and these are so comfortable and durable on our last 5 mile hike. Love them, and they are made to last a life time. Very cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Reyher

customer_reviews.title: I love them! Worth the money--very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First pair of danners. I love them! Worth the money--very comfortable, well constructed, and fit my normal boot size. Didn't order up.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot but did not come with the airthotic inserts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Danner boots!! Perfect for the Rocky Mountians!! 💙
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Reamy

customer_reviews.title: Yay!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Great for backpacking! Definitely order a 1/2 size down.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering these shoes online and having them fit, but I have to say. I LOVE these shoes. I wish I could wear them all day, every day. They are a little heavy, but at the same time feel like walking on a cloud. I feel like I could conquer anything while wearing these. I have already received many compliments wearing these out and about and I can't get enough of them. The leather is beautiful and soft, the shoe is gorgeous and I can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sizemore

product_meta.title: Danner Women's Mountain Light Cascade Hiking Boot
product_meta.description:
The women's mountain light cascade is a tribute to one of Danner iconic hiking styles introduced in the early 1970's – a style believed by many to be the greatest backpacking boot of all time, and is featured in the fox searchlight pictures release wild. Made in our Portland, ore. Factory, the boot features a rich, full-grain leather upper and flat red laces. The rugged Vibram kletterlift outsole is perfect for outdoor or casual use. It comes packaged in a vintage-style Danner box, an exact replica we used in 1995, the year cheryl strayed set off on her pacific crest trail adventure.How It Fits:The 650 M last offers a women's specific fit with ample room through the toe box while maintaining exceptional support and stability. This women's specific fit is based off our popular 650 last used for many of our classic styles and offers the most universal fit for everyday wear.

At Danner, they are craftsmen. They pay attention to details. They forgo quantity for quality, with the knowledge that the boots they craft are no better than the hands that create them.
feature_bullets: The product listed does not come with an insole,Stitchdown Construction - Handcrafted to provide a wider platform, our legendary stitchdown construction offers increased stability underfoot and many of our stitchdown boots can be recrafted.
Made in USA ,Sienna Cache leather has subtle color variations for an antiqued effect that patinas beautifully over time
Dri-Lex lining provides increased breathability and comfort. Retro One Piece Leather Upper. Shank-fiberglass
Danner’s hand-crafted stitchdown construction increases durability and underfoot stability. Features fiberglass shank and dri-lex liner
Vibram Kletterlift outsole is specifically designed for comfort and durability on both wet and dry surfaces
Danner’s 650 EE last offers a roomier fit without sacrificing support and stability. We recommend sizing down a half size for the best fit.
